task.title: Troubleshooting
task.shortdesc: Fix the most common setup and runtime issues when loading datasets and running route queries.

section.title: loadData() returns False
section.p: Likely cause: file not found, unreadable file, or a parsing error during load.
Fix: confirm paths and filenames, and ensure the input files follow the expected comma-separated formats.

section.title: KeyError when running route queries
section.p: Likely cause: the origin (or destination when finding return flights) has no outgoing flights in allFlights.
Fix: ensure that airport codes exist and that the dataset contains departing flights for that code before querying.

section.title: City/country queries return an empty list
section.p: Likely cause: city/country matching is case-sensitive and must match the dataset spelling.
Fix: use the same casing as in airports.txt (for example, Toronto, not toronto).

section.title: TypeError when creating a Flight
section.p: Likely cause: origin/destination were not provided as Airport objects.
Fix: create or look up Airport objects first, then pass them into the Flight constructor.
